nodes.text: Located on the Mid Rim planet Ord Mantell, barrack block 5 Epsilon was a barracks complex within Fleet Support, an installation built by 22 BBY  and utilized by the Galactic Republic's Grand Army in 22 BBY. Shortly after the First Battle of Geonosis at the opening of the Clone Wars between the Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, clone commandos RC-1309 and RC-8015 were billeted in the barrack block, which was otherwise deserted. The area was furnished with bunks and lockers, the latter of which the commandos used to store their equipment.
Barrack block 5 Epsilon appeared in the 2004 novel Republic Commando: Hard Contact, written by Karen Traviss.
